Container.Name: Subsistence
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Subsistence and run it.
**ATTENTION:** First startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files and also installs dotnet45!
**First Start Notice:** On First startup the container installs dotnet45 and it might seem that the container hangs but please be patient since the installation can take very long on some systems (5 minutes+).
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container downloads at startup. If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '1362640 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

Config.Name: GAME_PARAMS
Config.Description: Enter your extra startup parameters here or leave empty.

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: UDP1 - Game Port
Config.Description: UDP GamePort (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new UDP port mapping here in the template with the Container and Host port set to the same as in your configuration).

Config.Name: UDP2 - QueryPort
Config.Description: UDP QueryPort (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new UDP port mapping here in the template with the Container and Host port set to the same as in your dedicatedserver.cfg).

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).
